nodes.bodyText: Does AppConfiguration have Microsoft Docs? I'd rather link to that than their GitHub page since those will be more official.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -47,15 +47,8 @@ public SettingSelector() { /** * Gets the expressions to filter {@link ConfigurationSetting#getKey() keys} on for the request. * - *

- * Examples: - *

    - *
  • If {@code keyFilter = "*"}, settings with any key are returned.
    • - *
  • If {@code keyFilter = "abc1234"}, settings with a key equal to "abc1234" are returned.
    • - *
  • If {@code keyFilter = "abc*"}, settings with a key starting with "abc" are returned.
    • - *
  • If {@code keyFilter = "*abc*"}, settings with a key containing "abc" are returned.
    • - *
  • If {@code keyFilter = "abc,def"}, settings with a key equal to "abc" or "def" are returned.
    • - *
+ *

See Filtering

nodes.bodyText:
their doc hasn't been updated yet. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-app-configuration/concept-key-value#query-key-values
The service team will update it when GA.
